titleStmt.title: Luctus posthumus siue Erga defunctum illustrissimum Henricum Walliæ Principem, Collegij Beatæ Mariæ Magdalenæ apud Oxonienses Mecænatem longè indulgentissimum, Magdalenensium officiosa pietas
titleStmt.author: Magdalen College (University of Oxford)
Frewen, Accepted, 1588-1664.

notesStmt.note: The last four leaves contain a funeral oration by Accepted Frewen.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
